title: SMK Stellar
features: Dynamic ventilation with top and chin vents

product_details.sizing_fit: Intermediate oval. Designed for Asian and Indian head shapes.
product_details.description: The SMK Stellar is one of India's most popular sport-touring helmets. It packs a remarkable feature set — dual visor, Pinlock-ready shield, and DOT/ECE/ISI triple certification — into a price point that's accessible to most Indian riders.

sizing_fit.fit_notes: Designed with the Indian rider in mind. Comfortable for long commutes on two-wheelers.

safety_intelligence.analysis: Triple-certified (ISI, ECE, DOT) which is remarkable at this price point. The thermoplastic shell is durable and meets all required impact standards. Best value proposition in the Indian market for commuters who want international-grade safety.
